text: Timoti nden han kegap, ana ntigera zav, nzan hɨgi. Ana hɨgap, kaman vhuuŋ guareŋra nza nɨɨŋgi. Ana khaŋ nza nzuai, nde khaŋ tɨga havhargiap, guigira Zisas khothɨgi, nde guigira ndavir wari ga ndɨɨi. Ana vhɨra khaŋ nzuai, nde zazera nza ndɨkndɨgap, nza nzuav ndavi mbɨrav ki. Nde, nza nde gangir zav, nde ndɨkndɨgap ndavi simgiap ki tɨvara muuŋgiap, nde nza gangir zav ndavi simgiap ki.
